title: Bathroom
description: Bath, hair dryer, cleaning products, shampoo, conditioner, body soap, hot water, and shower gel.

title: Bedroom and Laundry
description: Free washer and dryer, towels, bed linen, cotton linen, wardrobe, safe, iron, and more.

title: Entertainment
description: 65-inch HDTV, Bluetooth sound system, arcade games, pool table, and reading materials.

title: Family Features
description: Cot, travel cot, playroom with books and toys, board games, and more for children.

title: Heating and Cooling
description: Air conditioning, electric fireplace, ceiling fan, and central heating.

title: Home Safety
description: Cameras at the door and front yard, smoke alarm, carbon monoxide alarm, extinguisher, and first aid kit.

title: Internet and Office
description: High-speed WiFi and a private room with a dedicated workspace.

title: Kitchen and Dining
description: Full kitchen with fridge, oven, Keurig, toaster, rice cooker, blender, utensils, and dining table.

title: Location Features
description: Lake access via dock, private entrance, nearby launderette, and direct waterfront access.

title: Outdoor
description: Back garden, patio, firepit, hammock, kayak, boat berth, BBQ grill, and sun loungers.

title: Services
description: Self check-in via keypad and long-term stays allowed (28+ days).
